name: fred the sea turtle
notes:
you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions and photos to crochet fred the sea turtle

size: 10" from head to end of shell
skill level: beginner-intermediate 
the pattern uses standard american terms
yarn: bernat blanket

this turtle worked completely seamlessly, with no sewing required.
you will be attaching the pieces as you crochet.

make sure you know all the basic stitches before attempting to crochet this pattern. i have also included a full video tutorial for you to crochet along.

please note that this pattern can be found for free on my blog, with ads at cjdesignblog.com

i would love to see your finished products
tag me on instagram @cj.dsgn and use the hashtag #fredtheturtle

refund
there are no refunds on patterns

resell finished product with pattern credit
